item.title: Help me fix this small command please
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

could someone help me fix this ::combat to where it gives them the stats, but they can ONLY do it once. right now i only have it to where it gives it per 5 hrs with System.currentTimeMillis which i know is awful. if someone could help, that would be great. this command IS working right now. just need to adjust it a little

[code]if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“combat”)) {
if (c.inWild())
return;
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.combatDelay > 50000000) {
c.combatDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
for (int i = 0; i <= 4; i++) {
c.playerLevel[i] = 99;
c.playerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(i);
c.sendMessage(“Remember, you can only use this every 5 hours.”);

                           		 } 
                                    c.playerLevel[6] = 99;
                                    c.playerXP[6] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99);
                                    c.getPA().refreshSkill(6);

} else {
c.sendMessage(“You can only do this every 5 hrs!.”);
}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Help me fix this small command please
